analysis.description:
ADXExchange.onlyBidAceptee (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#405-412) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)

ADXExchange.onlyBidAceptee (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#405-412) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)
ADXExchange.onlyBidOwner (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#398-405) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].advertiser)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].advertiser)

ADXExchange.onlyBidAceptee (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#405-412) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].publisher)
ADXExchange.onlyBidOwner (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#398-405) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].advertiser)
	- require(bool)(msg.sender == bidsById[_bidId].advertiser)
ADXExchange.onlyBidState (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#412-417) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(bidsById[_bidId].state == _state)
	- require(bool)(bidsById[_bidId].state == _state)
bid in ADXExchange.placeBid (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#448) is a local variable never initialiazed

Drainable.withdrawToken (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#107-119) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,bal) (/unique_contracts/0x0f6029ebde2ecd9ab4d60dd5d0a297e9e59bf77a.sol#114-119)
